synopsis.text: In a world teeming with mysterious forces and relentless power struggles among diverse clans, Luo Zheng, once a revered young master, finds himself reduced to a mere family slave following his family's downfall. His sister is cruelly imprisoned by an overpowering faction, leaving him no choice but to serve others. However, in the midst of despair, a glimmer of hope emerges. An ancient book bequeathed by his father harbors a magical spell capable of transforming a human into an instrument of immense power. As Luo Zheng embarks on a journey to reclaim his lost glory, refusing to bow down to fate, he inadvertently hones his body into a divine weapon, marking the beginning of a legendary stand against adversity.
